message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. While I'm interested, $11,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $11,500 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11,000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product!

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,000 is still a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now. I'm happy to go up to $10,750, which is a fair compromise.  It's a good price for both of us, and I'm confident I'll be happy with the product.

Hi Bob, I understand that $11,000 was still a bit too high for you, but I'm not willing to go down to $10,750 just yet. I'm willing to make another concession and sell it to you for $10,900. It's a good price for both of us, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
